description: This file is an HTML document that serves as a front-end interface for a database viewer. It includes both structure and embedded JavaScript for dynamic data rendering.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases from the server.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles the toggle action for displaying tables of a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table in a specific database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and renders an HTML table from the provided data.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles the expansion of table cells to show full data content.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Displays a loading message in a specified DOM element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message in a specified DOM element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Displays an empty state message indicating no data is available.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Sets the active class on the specified element and removes it from others.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches data from a specified URL and returns the parsed JSON.
